meanings.definition: Not having a specific direction or orientation.
meanings.sent1: The nondirectional antenna can receive signals from all directions.
meanings.sent2: The compass was nondirectional, making it hard to navigate.
meanings.sent3: The nondirectional wind blew my hat off in every direction!
meanings.sent4: Her nondirectional approach to problem-solving allows for creative solutions.
meanings.sent5: The nondirectional lighting in the room created a cozy atmosphere.

meanings.definition: Not favoring any particular direction or side.
meanings.sent1: The nondirectional referee made fair calls throughout the game.
meanings.sent2: The nondirectional policy ensured equal opportunities for all employees.
meanings.sent3: The nondirectional traffic sign confused drivers who were used to clear instructions.
meanings.sent4: His nondirectional stance in the debate earned him respect from both sides.
meanings.sent5: The nondirectional distribution of resources promoted equality among the community.
